record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 2070
record.narrative:
MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 2070 -- (Senate - September 20, 2007)

[Page: S11775]

speaking.paragraph: It is my understanding that S. 2070 is at the desk and due for its second reading.

record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 2070) to prevent Government shutdowns.

speaking.paragraph: I object to any further proceedings with respect to this bill.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be placed on the calendar.
